posts.post_content: Bringing this out while Boartusk Liege is already on the table and your opponent knows they're in for it, because you just summoned a virtual 5/5 Haste Wither creature with only 3 mana. Not to mention more than once I've attached Runes of the Deus to Ram-Gang on the same turn, making it a 7/7 Haste/Wither/Double Strike/Trample BEAST - you just can't beat it. I love this card.
